replies.author: Iama小鸭
replies.txt_content:
标题: [SPP/SMP]Ruby Mod红宝石MOD|工具,武器,装备,熔炉[1.7.10] 本帖最后由 Iama小鸭 于 2014-12-16 19:22 编辑 

                     安装MOD后增加：
矿物,工具,武器,装备,熔炉,方块(方块就是红宝石块之类的)
 装MOD： /.minecraft/mods/

FastasyWorldMOD搬运




                     













本人亲测（可能矿物生成比较多）

Download:
网盘下载：
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1sj0S3gh

MCBBS下载（版本1.7.10）




RubyMod-[1.7.10]v0.1.jar
(52.5 KB, 下载次数: 2269)



2014-12-16 19:13 上传
点击文件名下载附件






沙发叫我介绍详细点,我现在就修改一下吧

这个MOD包括：
[tr]硬化的红宝石
[tr]终极的红宝石
[tr]所有红宝石工具：斧头,铲子,锄头，稿子
[tr]终极Ruby工具！[tr]！！
[tr]-红宝石炉（比正常炉，更快的燃烧，只使用硬块燃料）
[tr]-红宝石矿（高刷新率）
[tr]-红宝石块
[tr]硬化Ruby块
[tr]-红宝石的盔甲
[tr]终极红宝石盔甲
[tr]

[tr]作者的话
Well, this is my first mod. All textures were created by me and everything was coded by me and all of that. I would really like it for somebody to create a Mod Showcase to get my mod out there. It took a while to create. This is for MC Version 1.7.10. The recommended Forge version is 10.13.2.1230 or later. I know there are bugs with the furnace and other things but that's why there is a change logs spoiler so I can fix bugs. I also know its a small mod but it adds a way to get OP items with Ruby Ore(found everywhere), and turn the Rubys into Ultimate Rubys to make the OP Tools and Armor Set. I WILL be adding more items. Would like for you guys to suggest things in this thread.




合成
